items.name: Barbell Back Squat
items.description: Compound exercise targeting legs, glutes, and core. Place barbell across upper back, squat down until thighs are parallel to ground

items.name: Bench Press
items.description: Classic chest exercise. Lie on bench, lower barbell to chest and press up with controlled movement

items.name: Deadlift
items.description: Full body compound movement. Lift barbell from ground keeping back straight, driving through heels

items.name: Pull-ups
items.description: Upper body exercise targeting back and biceps. Hang from bar and pull yourself up until chin passes bar

items.name: Overhead Press
items.description: Shoulder strength exercise. Press barbell from shoulders to overhead position while standing

items.name: Romanian Deadlift
items.description: Targets hamstrings and lower back. Hinge at hips with slight knee bend, lower weight while keeping back straight

items.name: Dumbbell Row
items.description: Back exercise. Bend over supporting yourself on bench, row dumbbell to hip level

items.name: Leg Press
items.description: Machine-based leg exercise. Push weight sled away from body using leg strength

items.name: Tricep Dips
items.description: Isolation exercise for triceps. Lower body between parallel bars, then push back up

items.name: Lat Pulldown
items.description: Back exercise using cable machine. Pull bar down to upper chest while seated

items.name: Lunges
items.description: Unilateral leg exercise. Step forward and lower back knee toward ground, alternate legs

items.name: Face Pulls
items.description: Rear deltoid and upper back exercise. Pull rope attachment to face level with high cable

items.name: Calf Raises
items.description: Isolation exercise for calves. Rise up on toes while standing, can be done with or without weights

items.name: Bicep Curls
items.description: Isolation exercise for biceps. Curl weight from full arm extension to shoulder while keeping elbows still

items.name: Plank
items.description: Core exercise. Hold push-up position on forearms, keeping body straight and core engaged
